channel.title: Abouts on Crimson Kindness
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Crimson Kindness

item.title: About
item.description: Crimson Kindness was founded in February of 2013 out of a desire to make our campus a more kind place. Inspired by the Random Acts of Kindness Foundation, Crimson Kindness set out to make a difference on campus and in the Tuscaloosa community. Our Mission The goal of Crimson Kindness on The University of Alabama campus is to create a community of kindness by engaging the student population in acts of kindness and inspiring kindness in our community.
